text: Francesca Keyko Cipriani Burgos (born November 20, 1992, in Guayas Province) is an Ecuadorian model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Ecuador 2015 and represented Ecuador at Miss Universe 2015. ==Personal life== Francesca studied Enterprise Management and Engineering in International Business at Universidad Santa María in Guayaquil. She currently works as a model. In 2010, she competed in her first pageant, World Miss University in South Korea. In 2011, she joined Chica Look CyZone Ecuador. In 2014, she was selected as Cosmo Girl 2014 for Cosmopolitan magazine. ==Miss Ecuador 2015== In 2015, she was crowned Miss Guayas and represented her region at the Miss Ecuador contest. On March 14, 2015, Francesca was crowned Miss Ecuador 2015. in Guayaquil, Ecuador. The runners-up in the pageant were declared as "Miss International Ecuador" and "Miss Supranational Ecuador". As Miss Ecuador 2015, Francesca competed at the Miss Universe 2015 pageant, but did not place. == References == ==External links== *Official Miss Ecuador website Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian beauty pageant winners Category:Miss Universe 2015 contestants Category:People from Guayas Province
title: Francesca Cipriani
